FuncDef: This command assigns an IP address to the management Ethernet port on the active CPM in the running configuration and the Boot Option File (BOF) or the standby CPM for systems using redundant CPMs. Deleting a BOF address entry is not allowed from a remote session.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the destination address of the aggregate route in dotted decimal notation. Values-ipv4-prefix |a.b.c.d (host bits must be 0)|, ipv4-prefix-length|0 to 32|, ipv6-prefix|x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces), |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d|, |x: |[0 to FFFF]H, |d: |[0 to 255]D, ipv6-prefix-length|0 to128|.
specifies which CPM Ethernet address is being configured: the active CPM Ethernet or the standby CPM Ethernet. ParamDefault: Default- active
